name: I'm Stephen and I'm a Park
name_original: I'm Stephen and I'm a Park
description:
Hello. Please, do come over and enjoy your stay. I must only ask you to not take any pictures of me. Welcome, my name is Stephen and I'm a park.

I'm Stephen and I am a Park is a management/strategy game where players are tasked to take control of the park and defend the trees from people trying to take pictures of them. During day time, make sure to defend the trees by blowing away tourists. while at night time, build new trees and improve the previous ones!

The game has been updated, optimised and polished for more recent hardware.

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Interact/Attack
  • Right Click (Hold) - Move Camera Around
  • Scroll Wheel - Increase/Decrease Camera Height
  • Space Bar - Slow Motion

Credits

  • Chris Fagan: Game Design, Level Design
  • Claudio Visentin: Programming, Tech-Related Work

Some fonts and art are open source and used in a non commercial way according to their respective license. Musics and sound effects have been taken from properly licensed asset packs.

Original Release Date: May 2019
